SELECT AD_COLUMN_IDENTIFIER(p_TableName, p_Record_ID, v_Language ) INTO v_Display FROM DUAL; RETURN v_Display; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN RETURN '**'; END AD_COLUMN_IDENTIFIER_STD
